main event: A UFO sighting report documented in Project Blue Book regarding an unidentified object observed 13 miles south of Columbus AFB.
interesting points: The object was described as a football shape that increased in size gradually., Military implications suggested it could involve maneuvers and characteristics of an aircraft., The report concludes the object could be a probable balloon, astronomical phenomenon, or possibly an aircraft., Insufficient data was available for a thorough evaluation., The document is an official record card containing classified intelligence references.
witness description: ground observation noted, but no specific witnesses were mentioned.
